data.eml:eml: Varicuslacerta, a new species of goby (Teleostei, Gobiidae, Gobiosomatini, Nes subgroup) from a mesophotic reef in the southern Caribbean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tornabene, Luke, Robertson, D. Ross, Baldwin, Carole C. (2016): Varicuslacerta, a new species of goby (Teleostei, Gobiidae, Gobiosomatini, Nes subgroup) from a mesophotic reef in the southern Caribbean. ZooKeys 596: 143-156, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.596.8217, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.596.8217
